Meanwhile the sparks are just circling.

Sunhawk:  How long does it usually take the Vok high
council to decide whether to give us a weapon or not.

Snowowl:  The debate about whether or not to save my
spark started 200 stellar cycles before the
assasination was even planned and after it was
finished they still had to jump a few Decacycles (I
think that means months) back in time to save me just
before I went off line.

Sunhawk:  Oh brother.

OOC: rAuq I'm sure you can take a hint.  I don't want
an immediate decision, I just want some more
suggestions on how it should work to meet approval
which I'm sure the other council members would be glad
to provide.

--- x_rauq_x <x_rauq_x@...> wrote:
> ooC: I guess I was waiting for nothing... I had
> thought that more 
> than two or three people were controlling Predacons
> in this fight.
> 
> -- Megatron --
> 
> Megatron ducks the first missile, and the second
> explodes at his 
> feet in front of him, blowing him backwards. The
> Pred Leader ignores 
> his damages, and leaps up transforming into dragon
> form. He quickly 
> starts accelerating away from the Maximal base.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> > ::Hot Rod::
> > 
> > He is blated in the stomach by the two plasma
> shots. This causes 
> him to double over, as the rockets pass over him.
> > 
> > He watches as Megatron calls for a retreat.
> > 
> > He fires two rockets at the retreating Predacon
> leader.
> > 
> > ::Kup::
> > 
> > Kup pulls up out side the Maximal base. He
> transformes to bot 
> mode, and goes in, searching for the disturbance.
> 
>
